scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
scripts.pack:osx: npm run clean:osx && electron-packager . "GUI helper for web DB" --out=dist/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.36.2 --icon=assets/osx/logo.icns --ignore=dist --ignore=assets --ignore=builder.json --ignore=bower.json --ignore=README.md --ignore=.gitignore --ignore=preview.png
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean:win && electron-packager . "GUI helper for web DB" --out=dist/win --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.36.2 --icon=assets/win/logo.ico --ignore=dist --ignore=assets --ignore=builder.json --ignore=bower.json --ignore=README.md --ignore=.gitignore --ignore=preview.png
scripts.build: npm run build-for-prod && build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.build:osx: npm run build-for-prod && npm run pack:osx && node_modules/.bin/build "dist/osx/GUI helper for web DB-darwin-x64/GUI helper for web DB.app" --platform=osx --target="dist/osx" --appDir="."
scripts.build:win: npm run build-for-prod && npm run pack:win && node_modules/.bin/build "dist/win/GUI helper for web DB-win32-ia32" --platform=win --target="dist/win" --appDir="."
